brief: Produce a default _AdaptiveAction_ object for an modify object request to a model adapter.
description: This function returns a _AdaptiveAction_ object for the default action performed if a onModifyObject parameter is not specified on the associated _AdaptiveModelObjectType_. The action is not performed, but be aware that functions called while producing the _AdaptiveAction_ object may cause side effects. This function can be called as part of a onModify expression or for testing.

parameters.description: This is the adapterId of a model adapter. Variable custom::adapterId can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: adapterId

parameters.description: This is the adaptive object type of object being modified. Variable custom::objectType can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: objectType

parameters.description: This is the objectId of object to modify. Variable custom::objectId can be used to access this value in model expressions.
parameters.name: objectId

parameters.description:
This is an array of modifications. Variable custom::actions can be used to access this value in model expressions. Entries are of the form:

    [
        'add_value',
        'property name' or ['property name', ... ],
        value
    ]

    [
        'remove_property',
        'property name' or ['property name', ... ]
    ]

    [
        'remove_value',
        'property name' or ['property name', ... ],
        value
    ]

    [
        'set_property',
        'property name' or ['property name', ... ],
        value
    ]
parameters.name: entries

parameters.description: This specifics a modelId of model to use for producing results. If not specified, the adapter's current model will be used.
parameters.name: modelId

parameters.description: This specifies additional context information available to model expressions.
parameters.name: context
